message:
حاليا بحاول اشغل الدومين على azure 
كل المكتوب فى الdocumentation 
انى استخدمه من خلال cname 
حد شغل دومين قبل كده على azure ??
بس جوه vm مش webapp ???

data.message:
لو انت على VM وعاوز تربطها بالدومين فـ Azure مالوش علاقة نهائي بالموضوع ده.
كل اللي انت محتاجة تظبط الـ Nameservers بتاعت الدومين من لوحة تحكم الـ Domain Registrar بتاعك ، وتعمل A Record يشاور على الـ Public IP بتاع الـ VM ، وتخلي الويب سيرفر يعمل Bind للـ Domain Name في الكونفيجريشن بتاعت الويب سايت.
واصبر شوية حلوين كده او اعمل Flush DNS وهتلاقي كله تمام.
لا براحه عليا فين الnamespaces ?

بص انا عملت من godady الhostname و عملت الnameserver
و عملت الa record و عملت انه يشاور على الip 
كل ده معمول تمام
احمد رأفت

الـ Nameservers أسف ، 
https://www.godaddy.com/help/setting-custom-nameservers-for-domains-registered-with-us-12317
اعمل nslookup domainname.tld وشوف الأي بي هيرجع مظبوط ولا لأ
كل ده معمول تمام

مش شايف الip
Error determining IP Addresses

de el errors 
http://intodns.com/restart-technology.com
You need to add a CNAME record in your DNS zone what is the domain name?
cname is directing the domain not pointing it should work anyway with the direct right ???

1)You need to fix all the DNS issues, especially your name server issues.
2)CNAME is type of DNS record which is used as an alias for another domain e.g for a CNAME record:
www.google.com CNAME google.com www.google.com points to google.com, you need to configure a CNAME  as required to point to the other domain requested by Azure that is through modifying your DNS zone.

why mn el awl it's not working this is the first time this happens ...
Omar Mohsen
You have an issue with your name server 157.56.183.24, I am not sure what is wrong with the name server, there is insufficient information.

it comes from azure there is something you need to know this ip is attached to a domain azure gave me so right now i made a cname to that domain azure gave me so that www will direct my domain to that azure domain they gave me correct me if i am wrong
www is just an example, I am not sure what is required from the Azure documentation you will have to refer to that, even if you solve the CNAME issue, you need to fix your DNS issues first.
cool how to fix it then :D Omar Mohsen
You might have to look in your DNS zone, it most likely to be a problem with your BIND DNS zone configuration

dig @157.56.183.24 restart-technology.com

; <<>> DiG 9.9.7 <<>> @157.56.183.24 restart-technology.com

ns2.restart-technology.com. 86000 IN    A       157.56.183.24

الbind server configuration مفهوش مشاكل
انا access ع السيرفر بتاعه و متابع معاكم :D
Eslam Hamouda why you removed the comment ... it's wrong ?

Please check the A records
dig @8.8.4.4 restart-technology.com a

; <<>> DiG 9.9.5-3ubuntu0.3-Ubuntu <<>> @8.8.4.4 restart-technology.com a

I believe that you don't need to change your nameservers.
1- Create DNS A Record to you www.urdomain.com with your VM public IP; note that each VM in azure has both private and public IP
2- If you have windows VM and hosting in IIS then make sure to change the binding to add your domain (for example: www.urdomain.com) as a host header

Since u r using VMs (IaaS) so u r responsible for your configurations and u won't need any CNAME records
